text: <@U1VG8LNP3> - we want to remove it from the fabric master codebase and definitely out of the peer process.    So I guess it would be the second option - "delete it"
<@U0PB67X4K> Thanks.  This means the rest api will be unavailable for master. later we will start a new process for rest api?
can we make a peer in the docker toolbox environment instead of making a peer in a vagrant environment ??
<@U2BF87970>  - why not just use the Docker images we already have?
but yes - you could build a peer in Docker alone
